source_text: The consideration for the acquisition is $350,000 by way of the issue of 23,333,333 NPM shares at an issue price of $0.015 (1.5 cents) per share, and the granting of a 2% net smelter royalty to the Vendor, with buyout provisions favourable to NewPeak.
additional_details: The 2% net smelter royalty is granted to the Vendor and will be paid by NewPeak. There are buyout provisions favourable to NewPeak.
